directions: Place the dry sherry, garlic, bouillon, butter, Italian seasoning, and lemon into a large pot. Bring to a simmer over medium heat.  Add the mussels, cover, and simmer until the mussels have opened, about 5 minutes. Discard any unopened mussels.
ingredients: 3 quarts fresh mussels, scrubbed and debearded
title: Million Dollar Mussels
